channel.title: [Delta][317] NEED HELP FOR ASSAULT MINI GAME Please Help
channel.description: Ok so i got a 317 delta and i got the assault minigame working 100% but the problem is when i die i lose all my items if im not on my owner account so that goes for free players. i would like it to be you keep all your items and you get teleported to a certain destination ive looked everywhere on these forums, on other's forums,google and just no luck if someone can give me a link or possibly a snippet or any info on where it would be located at, please do post really been buggin me just feel the servers not fully there :)
